column4: isn't acroread in the medibuntu repo?.. i don't think its in the normal repo
do what i said, add the medibuntu repository.. it will work fine,t hats how id o it.
follow the instructions on medibuntu page.. http://www.medibuntu.org
did you add the repo and the gpg key?
yeah, i know how to add it.. did you add the gpg key?
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install medibuntu-keyring && sudo apt-get update
youtube plays in Opera, but in firefox it says flash missing.  anyway to fix?
when you went to youtube in firefox, there was a link there.. click it, and read the instructions
ok thanks!  but I foudn a better way.  apt-get install flash-nonfree
well, i've never done it that way, congrats
